scripts.build:lib: tsup src/main.ts --format iife,esm --dts --global-name legumes && (cat dist/main.global.js ; echo ";(typeof module == 'object')?(module.exports=legumes):0;") > dist/legumes.js && rm dist/main.global.js
scripts.build:min: tsup src/main.ts --minify --format iife --global-name legumes && (cat dist/main.global.js ; echo ";(typeof module == 'object')?(module.exports=legumes):0;") > dist/legumes.min.js && rm dist/main.global.js
scripts.build:cli: tsup src/cli.ts && sed -i '' "s/sed-auto-replace-date-yyyy-mm-dd/$(date '+%Y-%m-%d')/g" dist/cli.js && mv dist/cli.js legc && chmod +x legc
scripts.build:ide: mkdir site; npm run build:lib && node tools/make_editor.js
scripts.build:doc: npx typedoc --out _docs --entryPoints src/main.ts --hideInPageTOC true --hideBreadcrumbs true; rm _docs/README.md; mv _docs/modules.md _docs/a.md; npx concat-md --decrease-title-levels _docs > API.md; rm -rf _docs; node tools/doc_const.js;
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:cli
scripts.samples: npm run build:cli && cd samples && make FMT=svg EXT=svg && make FMT=svg-anim EXT=anim.svg && make FMT=svg-hand EXT=hand.svg; cd ../ && node tools/index_samples.js
scripts.test:txt: mkdir tmp; npm run build:lib && time node --max-old-space-size=1844674407370955161 tools/test_txt.js > tmp/dump.txt
scripts.test:midi: mkdir tmp; npm run build:lib && time node --max-old-space-size=1844674407370955161 tools/test_midi.js > tmp/dump.txt
